label: Task-3
title: Write article on submodule ecosystem status using DevOps technical report
description: The DevOps agent is producing a detailed technical report on the status of all 17 submodules (branch health, CI status, test counts, package health, issue counts, recent activity). Once the DevOps report is available at DevOps repo docs/report__2026-02-10__submodule-status.md, use it as source material to write a Journalist article covering: overall ecosystem health, which repos are thriving vs need attention, patterns across the submodules, and recommendations. Publish to publications/articles/2026-02-10__submodule-ecosystem-status.md. Blocked on DevOps Task-1.
